channel.title: Authors on AMRIT AMAR
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on AMRIT AMAR

item.description: I am a software engineer who loves learning about and solving challenging problems. I am currently working at Inflexion Games on a live-service survival multiplayer game called Nightingale! Previously, I was a software engineer at Meta Reality Labs Research where I worked on the future of Augmented Reality and Contextualized AI by developing Project Aria. I graduated from Cornell University with a Masters in 2020. My interests are in data design and engineering, virtual/augmented reality, artificial intelligence, computational neuroscience, evolutionary algorithms, and game design.
